title: Parts of the Merchant Shipping (Investigation of Marine Accidents) Act 2025
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Merchant Shipping (Investigation of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Merchant Shipping (Investigation of 

Marine Accidents) Act 2025 (Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited merchant shipping (investigation marine accidents) act 2025 (commencement) order 2025

title: Parts of the Merchant Shipping (Investigation of Marine Accidents) Act 2025
heading: 2. The 1st day of June 2025 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of June 2025 is appointed as the day on which the following 
Parts of the Merchant Shipping (Investigation of Marine Accidents) Act 2025 
(No. 2 of 2025) shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1; 

(b) Part 5. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 May, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 
Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 16th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [188] 3
text_norm: 2 1st day june 2025 appointed day following part merchant shipping (investigation marine accidents) act 2025 (no 2 2025) shall come operation (a) part 1 (b) part 5 given official seal 13 may 2025 darragh brien minister transport notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 16th may 2025 188 3

title: Parts of the Merchant Shipping (Investigation of Marine Accidents) Act 2025
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order specifies the date on which Part 1 – General provisions and Part 5 – 
Offshore service vessels of the Merchant Shipping (Investigation of Marine 
Accidents) Act 2025 (No. 2 of 2025) come into operation. The date specified is 
1 June 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [188]
